attributes.action: Cut the foreign aid budget and use for reducing UK national debt.
attributes.background: Our foreign aid budget is notoriously abused, and is used by countries that have space programs and corrupt governments. The UK taxpayer funds should be spent more wisely during this period of austerity and high national debt.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104655

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
